question: Why should I prefer Rathinam College?
answer: Rathinam Techzone, a campus with various institutions, encompassing the spectrum of Pre-KG to Ph.D education and Technology Parks, including a Special Economic Zone (SEZ).

question: Where is Rathinam College Situated?
answer: Rathinam college is situated near Eachanari, Rathinam Techzone is a knowledge-centric township built in about 70 acres, located inside the Coimbatore Corporation on the NH-209. The campus also has an IT Park and an Entertainment Zone.

question: How can I download the application?
answer: Click the below link to download the application form.

question: What is the transport facility available at Rathinam? And what are the routes covered?
answer: Safe transport facility is available in and around Coimbatore. College buses are available from Udumalpet, Annamalai, Tirupur and other areas. Contact: Mrs. J. Kalavathi – Transport Manager, +91 8220666497, transport@rathinamtechzone.com.

question: What are the clubs functioning in Rathinam to develop my Extracurricular activities?
answer: Nature club, Cultural club, Media arts club, Youth Red Cross, NSS, Women’s club, Toast master club, Techno club, Competitive and Higher Education Club, Fashion and Art Club, Consumer Club, EDC, Rathinam Sports Club.

question: I am a sportsman. How do I get benefits from Rathinam?
answer: Sports students receive free accommodation and fee concessions if they represent the college in State or National level tournaments.

question: What are the new courses offered at Rathinam?
answer: B.Com Corporate Secretaryship, B.Com Banking and Insurance, B.Com Accounting and Finance, B.Com- Financial services, B.Com E-commerce, B.Com IT, B.Sc Microbiology, B.Sc Biochemistry, B.Sc Biotechnology.

question: Can I accommodate myself comfortable here?
answer: The boarding facility is like a home away from home. Separate hostels for boys and girls with Wi-Fi, security, CCTV, hygienic food court, coffee shops, restaurants, and beauty parlor facilities.

question: In what way Rathinam College helps me to get Placement?
answer: Rathinam provides career guidance, counseling, soft skills training, aptitude tests, communicative English sessions, and arranges on-campus interviews and job fairs.

question: What are the other benefits will I get while I am doing my course?
answer: Skill centers at Rathinam include ICICI Academy, NSDC, EDI, and L&T Training Center.

question: In what way Rathinam Techzone campus provides me industrial exposure?
answer: Students gain real-time learning experience at the IT Park within the campus and can also take up part-time jobs.

question: What Kind of Labs are functioning in this college?
answer: Labs include C & C++, Java, Web Technology, Open Source, System Software, Big Data Analytics, CAD, Sewing, Drafting, Testing, Tally, Commerce Lab, Costume Design Lab.

question: What are the interdisciplinary courses helps me to enhance my knowledge more than my subject?
answer: Students can benefit from choosing interdisciplinary papers from other departments.

question: How does Rathinam help me when I am in financial crisis?
answer: Scholarships include Adi-Dravidar & Tribal Welfare, Backward Classes scholarships, Minority Scholarships, Central Government scholarships, and Chief Minister’s Award for SC/ST students.

question: On What time the college starts?
answer: College timings are from 9:30 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.

question: In what way Rathinam college motivates the Viscom students?
answer: The college supports Viscom students’ creativity and provides financial support for the best student films.

question: Shall I pay the fees online?
answer: Yes, fees can be paid online through Net Banking, Credit/Debit cards by entering the register number and following the website instructions.
